name: No & Low Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 - Non-Alcoholic Red Wine
description: We proudly introduce our very own non-alcoholic Cabernet Sauvignon, developed with the same mastery, care, passion, and technique that goes into our winemaking process. Our 2021 vintage Cabernet Sauvignon touts grapes originating from the prestigious Maipo Valley in Chile. The wine then undergoes a delicate dealcoholization process to remove alcoholic content but preserve taste, texture, aromas, flavors, and antioxidant properties. The result? A top-shelf can’t-tell-the-difference kind of robust red wine experience. Crave without consequence — only with No & Low.

name: Misty Cliffs - Non Alcoholic Cabernet Sauvignon Merlot
description: Legendary winemaking brings forth this elegant alcohol-removed red wine. A complex melange of blackcurrant, cherry, well-balanced tannins, dark berry fruit, and spice. Pairs excellently with meat, cheeses, and a slew of tomato-based dishes.

name: Lautus Savvy Red - Non-Alcoholic Red Wine
description: Looking for a good non-alcoholic red wine? Lautus delivers an easy drinking & smooth red blend to enjoy without comprising on flavor. A pure South African non-alcoholic red wine made from a blend of Shiraz, Cabernet Sauvignon and Pinotage grapes sourced from various coastal vineyards, this red is aged in oak for 9 to 12 months.

name: "Dinner Party Reds" - Best Non-Alcoholic Red Wines (6-Pack)
description: Three bottles apiece of the best non-alcoholic red wines in the market, bundled together for all you red wine lovers! Enjoy guilt-free, hangover-free, regret-free wine rituals. Crave away at no consequence! This non-alcoholic bundle includes: • (3) 25.4oz (750ml) bottles of No & Low Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 Vintage • (3) 25.4oz (750ml) bottles of Lautus Savvy Red

name: No & Low Sparkling Chardonnay - Non-Alcoholic Sparkling Wine
description: Looking for the perfect non-alcoholic bubbly for any occasion? We’ve created a non-alcoholic Sparkling Chardonnay that tastes just like the real thing! We’ve carefully crafted our very own non-alcoholic champagne styled wine based off the feedback from our amazing community. We were asked to deliver the best tasting non-alcoholic wines in the world at the most accessible prices and our No & Low non-alcoholic Sparkling Chardonnay Wine is our first offering.

name: Surely Bubbly Red (4-Pack) - Non Alcoholic Sparkling Red Wine
description: Blend of NA Cabernet Sauvignon & Pinot Noir infused with lively bubbles. These canned bubbly red wines are fruit-forward with dark cherry, plum, & blackberry notes.

name: No & Low Chardonnay 2024 - Non-Alcoholic White Wine
description: ⭐️ Named Top-Rated NA Wine of 2025 by VinePair ⭐️ Meet our very own non-alcoholic Chardonnay, the result of an impassioned commitment to delivering complex top-quality wines while keeping it booze-free so you can crave without consequence. From the fruitful grounds of the Curicó subregion in Chile’s Central Valley, where the warm-summer breeze violins across exquisite vineyards, to a delicate dealcoholization process that preserves all the characteristics you love about an unoaked Chardonnay. Each sip of our non-alcoholic Chardonnay is a globe-trotting grandeur of aromas, flavors, and texture.

name: Wilfred's Bittersweet Aperitif - Non-Alcoholic Aperol
description: Wilfred’s have made sunshine in a bottle! This premium non-alcoholic aperitif makes the ultimate spritz. Named Britain’s #1 non-alcoholic drink at the Great British Food awards. This aperitif has been carefully crafted with inspiration from the classic Aperol Spritz but includes its own distinct British twist with subtle use of botanicals such as rosemary.

name: Spiritless Old Fashioned Pour Over 4-Pack - Non-Alcoholic Cocktail
description: You can now have your favorite Old-Fashioned cocktail on the go! Using their award-winning non-alcoholic bourbon, Kentucky 74. Spiritless now offers a zero-proof, ready-to-drink masterpiece with this Old-Fashioned cocktail.

name: Monday Whiskey - Non-Alcoholic Whiskey
description: Monday Whiskey is inspired by American classics, handcrafted in small batches by an award-winning Bourbon maker. Looking for a non-alcoholic whiskey you can sip neat or enjoy in an old fashioned? Monday Whiskey provides a mouth full of flavor and a spicy kick that mimics the burn of a traditional bourbon.

name: Everleaf Marine - Non-Alcoholic Spirit
description: A crisp & refreshing spirit inspired by the sea and crafted for gin drinkers. Everleaf Marine is a carefully chosen blend of 16 sustainably sourced botanicals that captures the heart of the Mediterranean sea, from umami-soaked kelp forests to zesty bergamot and tropical sea buckthorn. The perfect choice for gin lovers.

name: Everleaf Forest - Non-Alcoholic Aperitif
description: A complex and bittersweet aperitif crafted for spritz drinkers. Everleaf Forest is a unique blend of 14 sustainably sourced botanicals that capture the flavors of the forest, including exotic Saffron, rich Madagascan Vanilla, and honeyed Orange Blossom. This award-winning spritz will take your tastebuds on a ride through a sun-dappled forest!

name: Spiritless Kentucky 74 - Non-Alcoholic Whiskey
description: Kentucky 74 is the ultimate non-alcoholic choice for bourbon & whiskey lovers. A non-boozy bourbon? Yes! Of course it can’t be considered a “real” bourbon because the alcohol has been removed, but this is as close as you can get. Spiritless, the creators of Kentucky 74, set out to produce a high-quality & truly delicious non-alcoholic spirit for your favorite bourbon cocktails and along the way they’ve set the standard of what a non-alcoholic spirit should be!

name: Spiritless Margarita Pour Over 4-Pack - Non Alcoholic Cocktail
description: Muy caliente on the go! A sizzling symphony of Spiritless' award-winning Jalisco 55 non alcoholic tequila, a dash of all-natural cane sugar, fresh lime juice, and a touch of salt all come together to make a refreshingly portable zero-proof version of the beloved classic.

name: Classic Spritz - Non-Alcoholic Spritz Kit (3-Pack)
description: This kit includes everything you need to make your own Classic Spritz cocktail. It's non-alcoholic so you can satisfy your craving for a refreshing spritz, sans the guilt! This bundles makes approximately 11 Spritz cocktails. This non-alcoholic bundle includes the following: • (1) 16.9oz (500mL) bottle of Wilfred's Bittersweet Aperitif • (2) 25.4oz (750ml) bottles of No & Low Sparkling Chardonnay

name: Figlia Sole Alcohol-Free Aperitif
description: Juicy peach, zesty Meyer lemon, and a hint of basil come together in this bright, non-alcoholic aperitivo made for summer. Crisp, botanical, and beautifully tart, Sole captures the feeling of driving home with the windows down after a perfect day. Pour it over ice, top with bubbles, and savor a refreshingly grown-up ritual!

name: Everleaf Mountain - Non-Alcoholic Spirit
description: Everleaf Mountain is a vibrant & aromatic non-alcoholic spirit made for pink gin lovers. This one-of-a-kind spirit made to capture the flavors of the mountain is expertly blended with 12 sustainably sourced botanicals, including cherry blossom, rosehip and strawberry. A tasting adventure between a craft pink gin and a climb through the floral clouds of savory cherry blossom & sweet mountain strawberry!

name: Figlia Fiore - Alcohol-Free Aperitif
description: This Campari-style aperitivo embodies the lushness of Italian gardens & the feel good vibes of sidewalk dinners in New York City. Figlia Fiore is a non-alcoholic ode to the classic spritz but with its own twists. The name “Fiore” which means flower in Italian, sets the expectations of this fragrant & floral-forward aperitivo. Figlia encourages you to toast with intention and every sip being a reminder to take your time.

name: Pentire Coastal Spritz - Non-Alcoholic Aperitif
description: Spritz, beach, friends. Does it get any better? Pentire’s new aperitif embodies good times and is best sipped along the coast! Pentire has forged its signature coastal flavor profile with the iconic aperitivo culture. Let the Spritz’n begin with this natural plant-based and low calorie non-alcoholic Aperol replacement!

name: Lyre’s Italian Orange - Non-Alcoholic Campari
description: This unique non-alcoholic spirit has been impossibly crafted to capture the essence of a bitter orange aperitif such as Campari or Aperol.
